To order, simply leave your email by posting a comment
or email me at goldecstasy@hotmail.com
and I will get back to you within a day
As for payment, I accept POSB/DBS transfers, UOB transfers, Paypal
for transcations outside Singapore
and concealed cash/cheque (at buyer's own risk)

Goldecstasy was featured in the October 2007 issue of SEVENTEEN magazine
Please click here to view the write up
The rest of the accessories that are not listed here are all sold out
(Remakes will most likely be impossible)

For all puchase of accessories, postage comes free!
To view more of earlier collections,
please click on "Earlier" at the bottom of the page.
Thank you and
Happy browsing!

Hello Girls!

Format of order
Pendant: Mad Hatter Rabbit/Alice (delete where applicable)
Design: a/b/c/d/e/f (delete where applicable)
Alternative: eg, Alice Design F

You can choose between Mad Hatter or Alice pendant
and match it with a different charm design (a,b,c,d,e,f) of your choice.
You may also wish to state an alternative since pieces are extremely limited.


Any questions?
Feel free to email me at goldecstasy@hotmail.com

STATUS OF ITEMS:
Design A: Sold
Design B: Sold
Design C: Sold
Design D: Sold
Design E: Sold
Design F: Sold

Alice flees from a marriage proposal from
dorky young Lord Hamish by following a white rabbit.
She falls through a tunnel into the world
known as the Underland,
which is ruled by the oppressive Red Queen.
Alice soon learns that she is now the key
to defeating the queen and restoring Underland.

Love Alice in Wonderland?
You will want to watch this space :))
The cutest collection ever is coming up!

Format of order

Name:
Email address:
Name of necklace: Woodland Fairy/Sepia Birdie/Robotcop/Vintage Paris/Take Flight
Amount transferred:

Address:
Reference No:


Payment Mode

POSB SAVINGS 060-57605-0
UOB 3733010264


All comments will be screened.
This means that unless you are logged into your livejournal account,
you will not be able to see the comment that you have posted.
An email will be mailed to you when the pendants have arrived.


Here's a few things to note:

Pre Order closes on 14th Nov,11 pm

Necklaces will arrive 2 to 3 weeks from now.
Probably latest by the first week of December.
The last pre order took about 12 days to arrive.

These gorgeous pendants make great presents for Christmas.
Get them for ur girlfriends or family!
For purchase of 3 necklaces or more,
Registered mail comes free!

Please feel free to email me if you have any doubts.
I'm be more than happy to reply them.
Thank you! :)


Love, Pam
goldecstasy@hotmail.com

Hello Ladiessss,

The next collection will be launched
on this coming wed, 15th October at 8pm

I'm soooo excited over this collection, really!
A little hint on what's coming up?
Little Red Riding Hood, Cinderella, Sleeping Beauty
and Alice in Wonderland.
Not forgetting bracelets and bangles as well.

I really love them..so much that I cant bear to sell them off
I hope you'll love them just as much :)

Love, Pam

goldecstasy@hotmail.com
